summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York transmitting several FBI document files, identified by their case file numbers, as part of the Epstein case materials.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email transmitting FBI documents related to the Epstein case from the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Transmission of FBI Documents
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney emails several FBI document files related to the Epstein case.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated October 7, 2020, from an Assistant United States Attorney.
The email originates from the Southern District of New York, a key jurisdiction in the Epstein prosecution.
The email's purpose is to transmit at least four separate FBI document files, identified by their case numbers (e.g., FBI 0000018415).
The attached files are likely investigative reports (302s), evidence, or other case materials compiled by the FBI.
